title: Outbound visitor growth in Africa 2018 to 2022
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Year-over-year visitor growth, containing a total of 5 data points.
Overall Year-over-year visitor growth has decreased over the Year.
Year-over-year visitor growth is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, roughly increasing from 2019 to 2021, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2021 to 2022.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2020 and 2021.
Maximum Year-over-year visitor growth, about 6.1 was reported at Year 2018
Minimum Year-over-year visitor growth about 3.3 was reached at Year 2020
